description: cfg-restore Configuration. Restore the given configuration as the  running configuration without reboot.
title: CfgRestore

uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

server_type.description: Server Type. where the file is stored for Configuration restore.

file_name.description: Source File Name. Name of the configuration file to be restored.

tftp_server_address.description: TFTP server. Configuration restore file from TFTP Server.

sftp_server_address.description: SFTP server. Configuration restore file from TFTP Server.

is_forced_reboot_enabled.description: Apply the configuration with reboot if the configuration has reboot required commands.

is_recoverymode_enabled.description: RecoveryMode. To enable or disable recovery mode. Not applicable if is_forced_reboot_enabled is true.

is_oobm.description: Whether to use the OOBM port.
